pages.name: Overview
pages.description: Netlify build and browser agent data overview

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT latest(timestamp) as 'last build finished' FROM `Netlify:onEnd` SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
SELECT average(duration) as 'Avg Page Load', percentile(duration,50) as 'Median', percentile(duration,95) as 'Percentile', uniqueCount(session) as 'Visitors' FROM PageView SINCE 1 week ago

rawConfiguration.text:
[//]: <> (For lightmode change the image name below to netlify-full-logo-light.png)

![Netlify](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/newrelic/newrelic-quickstarts/main/quickstarts/netlify/images/netlify-full-logo-dark.png)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM PageView TIMESERIES 1 hour
SELECT percentile(duration,50),percentile(largestContentfulPaint,50) From PageView,PageViewTiming SINCE 3 days ago TIMESERIES 1 hour
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError since 60 minute ago until 10 seconds ago COMPARE WITH 1 hour ago

widgets.title: JS Errors compared with past JS error trends

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) from JavaScriptError TIMESERIES AUTO compare with 1 week ago
SELECT UniqueCount(session) FROM PageView  since 1 week ago COMPARE WITH 1 hour ago
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView  since 1 week ago COMPARE WITH 1 hour ago
SELECT average(duration) as 'seconds' FROM PageView  since 1 week ago COMPARE WITH 1 hour ago
SELECT average(duration) FROM PageView  since 1 day ago  FACET appName TIMESERIES
SELECT average(networkDuration) as 'Network (sec)', average(backendDuration) as 'Backend Time (sec)',average(duration) as 'Page Load time (sec)' FROM PageView SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT histogram(duration, 7, 100) FROM PageView FACET browserTransactionName SINCE 1 week ago

SELECT average(timeToFetchStart) AS 'Request queueing', average(timeToResponseStart) AS 'First byte', average(firstPaint) as 'First paint', average(firstContentfulPaint) as 'First contentful paint', average(timeToDomContentLoadedEventEnd) AS 'DOM content loaded', average(timeToLoadEventEnd) AS 'Window load', average(duration) AS 'Window load + AJAX' FROM BrowserInteraction WHERE category = 'Initial page load' AND `mobileOptimized` IS NULL

SELECT average(timeToFetchStart) AS 'Request queueing', average(timeToResponseStart) AS 'First byte', average(firstPaint) as 'First paint', average(firstContentfulPaint) as 'First contentful paint', average(timeToDomContentLoadedEventEnd) AS 'DOM content loaded', average(timeToLoadEventEnd) AS 'Window load', average(duration) AS 'Window load + AJAX' FROM BrowserInteraction WHERE category = 'Initial page load' TIMESERIES
SELECT percentile(duration,50),percentile(largestContentfulPaint,50) From PageView,PageViewTiming SINCE 3 days ago TIMESERIES 1 hour
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView TIMESERIES 1 hour SINCE 1 week ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

SELECT average(duration) AS 'Average Page Load Time', median(duration) AS 'Median Page Load Time', percentile(duration, 95) AS '95th % Page Load Time' FROM BrowserInteraction TIMESERIES SINCE 86400 seconds ago EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT average(duration) from PageView  facet pageUrl since 1 day ago TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView FACET pageUrl SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView FACET browserTransactionName SINCE 1 week ago LIMIT 25
SELECT average(duration) FROM PageView since 1 day ago FACET pageUrl TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(duration) from PageView since 7 day ago FACET pageUrl

SELECT count(*) as '# Pages',average(duration) as 'AVG',percentile(duration,50,75) as '%',average(duration - backendDuration) as 'Front',average(backendDuration) as 'Back',average(domProcessingDuration) as 'DOM Processing',average(pageRenderingDuration) as 'Page Rendering' FROM PageView  facet pageUrl SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 30

pages.name: Users
pages.description: Browser application users breakdown and sessions

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT uniqueCount(session) FROM PageView since 60 minute ago until 10 seconds ago COMPARE WITH 1 hour ago
SELECT count(session) FROM PageView  since 1 week ago COMPARE WITH 1 hour ago

SELECT percentage(uniqueCount(session), WHERE userAgentName = 'IE') AS '% of IE Users', percentage(uniqueCount(session), WHERE userAgentName = 'Chrome') AS '% of Chrome Users', percentage(uniqueCount(session), WHERE userAgentName = 'Firefox') AS '% of Firefox Users', percentage(uniqueCount(session), WHERE userAgentName = 'Safari') AS '% of Safari Users' FROM PageView SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) as 'Page Views' FROM PageView  FACET deviceType WHERE deviceType != 'Unknown' SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) as 'Page Views' FROM PageView  FACET userAgentOS SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) as 'Page Views' FROM PageView  FACET userAgentName SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT average(duration) FROM PageView FACET deviceType TIMESERIES SINCE 1 DAY AGO
SELECT average(duration) FROM PageView FACET userAgentOS TIMESERIES SINCE 1 DAY AGO
SELECT percentile(duration,50) from PageView facet userAgentName TIMESERIES SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 10
SELECT count(pageUrl) FROM PageView  FACET deviceType  TIMESERIES  SINCE 1 DAY AGO
SELECT count(pageUrl) FROM PageView  FACET userAgentOS  TIMESERIES  SINCE 1 DAY AGO
SELECT count(pageUrl) FROM PageView  FACET userAgentName  TIMESERIES  SINCE 1 DAY AGO
SELECT average(duration) FROM PageView FACET deviceType SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT average(duration) FROM PageView FACET userAgentOS SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT average(duration) FROM PageView FACET userAgentName SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) as 'Page Views' FROM PageView  FACET countryCode SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) as 'Page Views' FROM PageView  FACET city SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) as 'Page Views' FROM PageView  FACET asnOrganization SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT percentile(duration,50) from PageView facet countryCode TIMESERIES SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 10
SELECT percentile(duration,50) from PageView facet city TIMESERIES SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 10
SELECT percentile(duration,50) from PageView facet asnOrganization TIMESERIES SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 10
SELECT count(pageUrl) FROM PageView  FACET countryCode  TIMESERIES  SINCE 1 DAY AGO
SELECT count(pageUrl) FROM PageView  FACET city  TIMESERIES  SINCE 1 DAY AGO
SELECT count(pageUrl) FROM PageView  FACET asnOrganization  TIMESERIES  SINCE 1 DAY AGO
SELECT average(duration) FROM PageView FACET countryCode SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT average(duration) FROM PageView FACET city SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT average(duration) FROM PageView FACET asnOrganization SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT session FROM PageView since 60 minute ago until 10 seconds ago
SELECT count(*) , average(duration) as 'Avg' FROM PageView FACET session SINCE 1 day ago limit 25
SELECT average(duration) as 'Avg', count(*) FROM PageView FACET session SINCE 1 day ago limit 25
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView FACET weekdayOf(timestamp) SINCE 7 days ago
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView FACET hourof(timestamp) SINCE 24 hours ago
SELECT percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE timingName = 'largestContentfulPaint' FACET appName SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 75) FROM PageViewTiming  WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift IS NOT NULL AND timingName = 'pageHide' FACET appName SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE timingName = 'firstInteraction' FACET appName  SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT percentile(firstContentfulPaint, 75) as 'First Contentful Paint' FROM PageViewTiming
SELECT percentile(pageHide, 75) FROM PageViewTiming SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE timingName = 'firstInteraction' FACET interactionType LIMIT max

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE largestContentfulPaint < 2.5) AS 'good (< 2.5)', percentage(count(*), WHERE largestContentfulPaint >= 2.5 and largestContentfulPaint < 4) AS 'needs improvement (>= 2.5 < 4)', percentage(count(*), WHERE largestContentfulPaint >= 4) AS 'poor (>=4)' FROM PageViewTiming WHERE timingName = 'largestContentfulPaint' SINCE 1 week ago
SELECT percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 75), percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 95), percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 99) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE timingName = 'largestContentfulPaint'

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE largestContentfulPaint < 2.5) AS 'good (< 2.5)', percentage(count(*), WHERE largestContentfulPaint >= 2.5 and largestContentfulPaint < 4) AS 'needs improvement (>= 2.5 < 4)', percentage(count(*), WHERE largestContentfulPaint >= 4) AS 'poor (>=4)' FROM PageViewTiming WHERE  timingName = 'largestContentfulPaint' SINCE 1 week ago TIMESERIES

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift < 0.1) AS 'good (< 0.1)', percentage(count(*), WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift >= 0.1 AND cumulativeLayoutShift < 0.25) AS 'needs improvement (>= 0.1 < 0.25)', percentage(count(*), WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift >= 0.25) AS 'poor (>=0.25)'  FROM PageViewTiming WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift IS NOT NULL AND timingName = 'pageHide' SINCE 1 week ago

SELECT percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 75), percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 95), percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 99) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift IS NOT NULL AND timingName = 'pageHide'

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift < 0.1) AS 'good (< 0.1)', percentage(count(*), WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift >= 0.1 AND cumulativeLayoutShift < 0.25) AS 'needs improvement (>= 0.1 < 0.25)', percentage(count(*), WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift >= 0.25) AS 'poor (>=0.25)'  FROM PageViewTiming WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift IS NOT NULL AND timingName = 'pageHide'  TIMESERIES SINCE 1 week ago

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE firstInputDelay < 100) AS 'good (<100ms)', percentage(count(*), WHERE firstInputDelay >= 100 and firstInputDelay < 300) AS 'needs improvement (>=100 <300ms)', percentage(count(*), WHERE firstInputDelay >= 300) AS 'poor (> 300ms)' FROM PageViewTiming WHERE firstInputDelay IS NOT NULL since 1 week ago
SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 75), percentile(firstInputDelay, 95), percentile(firstInputDelay, 99) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE timingName = 'firstInteraction'

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE firstInputDelay < 100) AS 'good (<100ms)', percentage(count(*), WHERE firstInputDelay >= 100 and firstInputDelay < 300) AS 'needs improvement (>=100 <300ms)', percentage(count(*), WHERE firstInputDelay >= 300) AS 'poor (> 300ms)' FROM PageViewTiming WHERE firstInputDelay IS NOT NULL since 1 week ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Click to Filter to Transaction Name

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentile(firstContentfulPaint, 75), percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 75), percentile(firstInputDelay, 75), max(firstInputDelay), filter(percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 75), WHERE timingName = 'pageHide') as 'Cumulative Layout Shift', percentile(pageHide, 75) FROM PageViewTiming  FACET browserTransactionName LIMIT 50

pages.name: JavaScript Errors
pages.description: Browser application JavaScript error rates and trends

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError since 60 minute ago until 10 seconds ago COMPARE WITH 1 hour ago
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: JS Errors compared with past JS error trends

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) from JavaScriptError TIMESERIES AUTO compare with 1 week ago
SELECT count(*) from JavaScriptError FACET errorClass TIMESERIES 1 day
SELECT count(*) from JavaScriptError FACET errorMessage TIMESERIES 1 day
SELECT count(*) from JavaScriptError FACET releaseIds TIMESERIES 1 day
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError FACET deviceType SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError FACET userAgentOS SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError FACET userAgentName SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError FACET userAgentName, userAgentVersion SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT requestUri, errorClass, errorMessage, stackTrace  FROM JavaScriptError SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT latest(timestamp) as 'last build started' FROM `Netlify:onPreBuild` SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
SELECT latest(timestamp) as 'last build finished' FROM `Netlify:onEnd` SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM `Netlify:onPreBuild` TIMESERIES 1 week
SELECT count(*) FROM `Netlify:onBuild` TIMESERIES 1 week
SELECT count(*) FROM `Netlify:onPostBuild` TIMESERIES 1 week
SELECT count(*) FROM `Netlify:onEnd` TIMESERIES 1 week
SELECT count(*) FROM `Netlify:onSuccess` TIMESERIES 1 week
SELECT count(*) FROM `Netlify:onError` TIMESERIES 1 week
SELECT count(*) AS 'Builds Started' FROM `Netlify:onPreBuild` SINCE 1800 seconds ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) AS 'Builds Succeeded' FROM `Netlify:onSuccess` SINCE 1800 seconds ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) AS 'Builds Failed' FROM `Netlify:onError` SINCE 1800 seconds ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM `Netlify:onEnd` FACET branch TIMESERIES SINCE 1 week ago
SELECT count(*) FROM `Netlify:onEnd` FACET context TIMESERIES SINCE 1 week ago
SELECT latest(netlifyBuildVersion) FROM `Netlify:onPreBuild`, `Netlify:onBuild`, `Netlify:onEnd`, `Netlify:onPostBuild`, `Netlify:onSuccess`, `Netlify:onError` SINCE this quarter
SELECT latest(siteName) FROM `Netlify:onPreBuild`, `Netlify:onBuild`, `Netlify:onEnd`, `Netlify:onPostBuild`, `Netlify:onSuccess`, `Netlify:onError` SINCE this quarter
SELECT latest(repositoryUrl) FROM `Netlify:onPreBuild`, `Netlify:onBuild`, `Netlify:onEnd`, `Netlify:onPostBuild`, `Netlify:onSuccess`, `Netlify:onError` SINCE this quarter
